sentences.en: Accordingly Collins and I spent several economical and instructive weeks together in Ravenna.
sentences.cn: 因此,科林斯同我在腊万纳过了几周节俭的,有益的生活.

sentences.en: Animated games are particularly instructive and fun to do.
sentences.cn: 动画游戏特别有益和好玩.

sentences.en: Both formations provide instructive early examples of integration.
sentences.cn: 两者的成立提供了一体化的有益的先例.

sentences.en: For this purpose the study of globular clusters is most instructive.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上球状星团的研究最富有指导意义.

sentences.en: He found it both interesting and instructive to learn about the careersof great men.
sentences.cn: 他觉得了解伟人的生平既很有趣又有教益.

sentences.en: He had been as instructive as Milton's " affable archangel ".
sentences.cn: 他正如米尔顿那位 “ 亲切的天使长 ” 一样循循善诱.

sentences.en: Here Sanskrit is instructive precisely because it has preserved all the Indo - Europeans's features.
sentences.cn: 梵语在这里之所以富有教益,就因为它保存了印欧语的全部分.

sentences.en: I love you because you are so distinguished and your conversation is instructive and interesting.
sentences.cn: 我爱你,是因为你非常有风度,你谈起话来很有内容,很有意思.

sentences.en: It is instructive to present both these views.
sentences.cn: 先提到这两点是很有意义的.

sentences.en: Thank you, that was very instructive.
The novel is so instructive that I can hardly tear myself away from it.
sentences.cn: 这部小说很有意义,简直使我爱不释手.

sentences.en: This article is instructive except for a few blunders.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章除了有些错误外,是有教育意义的.

sentences.en: This book is not only interesting but also instructive.
sentences.cn: 这本书不但有趣而且还富有教育性.

sentences.en: Two cases of international investment are instructive.
sentences.cn: 有两种国际投资情况是具有启发性的.

sentences.en: While it will be fun, the seminar also promises to be most instructive.
sentences.cn: 这次的研讨会不仅会有趣，而且有可能会颇具启发意义。

words.tran_cn: 指令，命令；指示；教导；用法说明

trans.tran_en: providing a lot of useful information
